name: Space Rush (PaRK66, salmashnur)
description:
A first person shooter as you shoot your way through waves and waves of enemies. Running around trying to avoid getting shot as you pick up more and more guns that enemies have a chance of dropping. You know carrying all these guns seems kind of useless if you're not going to use them, how about you change that. As the more guns you pick up you'll immediately use it, firing alongside your other guns.

This project was my first time taking part in a game jam, while I handled only the design, player controls and shooting, I was lucky enough to have an incredible partner who picked up my slack and handled everything else, Salma. Together we made this game and I hope you enjoy playing it as much as it was making it!
